textBeforeTable: These seven metrics are a snap to calculate, thanks to Quicken.com's One-Click Scorecard. Our goal with this tool is to help you evaluate potential investment candidates and eliminate those equities that aren't up to snuff. One-Click Scorecard won't do all the homework necessary for you to reach a decision, but it will help you develop a list of quality stocks to watch and study further.
